meanings.sent1: The slyboots always knew how to get what they wanted without anyone suspecting.
meanings.sent2: She thought he was just a regular guy, but he turned out to be a slyboots.
meanings.sent3: The slyboots managed to outsmart everyone at the game with their clever moves.
meanings.sent4: His charming smile hid the true nature of a slyboots underneath.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the slyboots in sheep's clothing, they are not as innocent as they seem.

meanings.sent1: The little slyboots tricked his friends into believing his made-up stories.
meanings.sent2: She was caught red-handed being a slyboots by her teacher.
meanings.sent3: The slyboots pretended to be sick to avoid doing their chores.
meanings.sent4: His eyes gleamed with mischief, a true slyboots at heart.
meanings.sent5: The mischievous slyboots left a trail of pranks wherever they went.
